title: The perfect sponge cake
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '225g (8 oz) caster sugar', '225g (8 oz) softened butter or margerine', '4 eggs', '225g (8 oz) self-raising flour', '1 level teaspoon baking powder (raising agent)', 'vanilla extract, to taste', 'For the filling', '50ml to 75ml double cream', '100g to 150g icing sugar', '2 to 3 tablespoons strawberry jam']
